ModMetaData.name: Caravan Auto Food Restrictions
ModMetaData.author: nath_dev
ModMetaData.description:
Tired of changing your pawn food restriction everytime your start a caravan ?
Caravan Auto Food Restrictions allow to set a caravan food restriction for your pawn once and for all throughout the Assign menu. The mod auto-change the pawn current food restriction to the selected one in assign menu when caravanning and resets it when returning home.
